description: Order validation audit trail info like user/ instant/ work station /result/ dat etc.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_VAL_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who validated the order.

columns.name: ORD_VALID_INST
columns.description: The instant when the order record was validated.

columns.name: ORD_VALID_CONTEXT_NAME
columns.description:
list of special requirements a patient needs for transfused blood


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ORD_VALID_LWS_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the workstation record from which the order record was validated.

columns.name: ORD_VALIDAT_RES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The validation result category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Success


Fail

columns.name: ORD_VALID_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) for when the order record was validated.

columns.name: ORDER_VAL_DEVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The device category ID for the order, indicating the type of device used for user authentication while validating this order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ORDER_VAL_NUM_FACT
columns.description: The number of factors used for user authentication while validating this order record.
